price: (26) The last of it[1884] is musk. So for this let the competitors compete.
arabic: خِتَٰمُهُۥ مِسۡكٞۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلۡيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلۡمُتَنَٰفِسُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: khitāmuhu mis'kun wafī dhālika falyatanāfasi al-mutanāfisūna
